velKoz:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
velKoz:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

velKoz:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
velKoz:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
velKoz:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

velKoz:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
velKoz:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

velKoz:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
velKoz:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !velKoz:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

velKoz:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
velKoz:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !velKoz:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

velKoz:VoidBeam.NAME: Void Beam
velKoz:VoidBeam.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

velKoz:VoidRift.NAME: Void Rift
velKoz:VoidRift.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice.
